org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Interface ClusterTopology

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterTopologyImpl

    public interface ClusterTopology
    Represents a full cluster topology including all instance information as well as the associated blueprint which provides all abstract topology information.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterId

        Long getClusterId()
        Get the id of the cluster.
        Returns:
        cluster id

      • setClusterId

        void setClusterId(Long clusterId)
        Set the id of the cluster.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - cluster id

      • getBlueprint

        Blueprint getBlueprint()
        Get the blueprint associated with the cluster.
        Returns:
        assocaited blueprint

      • getConfiguration

        Configuration getConfiguration()
        Get the cluster scoped configuration for the cluster. This configuration has the blueprint cluster scoped configuration set as it's parent.
        Returns:
        cluster scoped configuration

      • getHostGroupInfo

        Map<String,HostGroupInfo> getHostGroupInfo()
        Get host group information.
        Returns:
        map of host group name to host group information

      • getAllHosts

        Set<String> getAllHosts()
        Returns:
        all hosts in the topology

      • getHostGroupsForComponent

        Collection<String> getHostGroupsForComponent(String component)
        Get the names of all of host groups which contain the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - component name
        Returns:
        collection of host group names which contain the specified component

      • getHostGroupForHost

        String getHostGroupForHost(String hostname)
        Get the name of the host group which is mapped to the specified host.
        Parameters:
        hostname - host name
        Returns:
        name of the host group which is mapped to the specified host or null if no group is mapped to the host

      • getHostAssignmentsForComponent

        Collection<String> getHostAssignmentsForComponent(String component)
        Get all hosts which are mapped to a host group which contains the specified component. The host need only to be mapped to the hostgroup, not actually provisioned.
        Parameters:
        component - component name
        Returns:
        collection of hosts for the specified component; will not return null

      • update

        void update(TopologyRequest topologyRequest)
     throws InvalidTopologyException
        Update the existing topology based on the provided topology request.
        Parameters:
        topologyRequest - request modifying the topology
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException - if the request specified invalid topology information or if making the requested changes would result in an invalid topology

      • addHostToTopology

        void addHostToTopology(String hostGroupName,
                       String host)
                throws InvalidTopologyException,
                       NoSuchHostGroupException
        Add a new host to the topology.
        Parameters:
        hostGroupName - name of associated host group
        host - name of host
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException - if the host being added is already registered to a different host group
        NoSuchHostGroupException - if the specified host group is invalid

      • isNameNodeHAEnabled

        boolean isNameNodeHAEnabled()
        Determine if NameNode HA is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if NameNode HA is enabled; false otherwise

      • isYarnResourceManagerHAEnabled

        boolean isYarnResourceManagerHAEnabled()
        Determine if Yarn ResourceManager HA is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if Yarn ResourceManager HA is enabled; false otherwise

      • isClusterKerberosEnabled

        boolean isClusterKerberosEnabled()
        Determine if the cluster is kerberos enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the cluster is kerberos enabled; false otherwise

        Install the specified host.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
